mapper.select: SELECT f.ifeed, f.contents, f.location, f.created_at as createdAt , u.iuser , u.nm as writer , IF(fv.ifeed >0,1,0) as isFav FROM t_feed f JOIN t_user u ON f.iuser=u.iuser LEFT JOIN t_favorite fv ON f.ifeed = fv.ifeed AND fv.iuser = #{iuser} ORDER BY f.ifeed DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

SELECT ifeed, pic FROM t_feed_pic WHERE ifeed in
#{ifeed}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_favorite WHERE ifeed = #{ifeed} AND iuser = #{iuser}
